title: Twice as complicated and half as fun as the original
text:
This isn't just an electronic version of the same "Life" game from years ago. In addition to making it electronic the game itself is different, but not necessarily better (no stock, auto insurance or life insurance to buy for example, and no wedding gifts or baby gifts etc).

Every player gets a card and one calculator-type device gets passed around. You put your card in it and record whatever money you received or paid during a turn. The device tallies all the money and tells you who won. If you prefer the original "Life" game but not the hassle of dealing with paper money on every turn just give every player a calculator and let them tally their individual money totals on their own devices. Then you don't have to pass around one device, you don't have any cards to keep track of, and you can play the original game but "electronically."

title: Good build quality and works as advertised

title: A mediocre toy
text: This just doesn't work all that well.  You have to talk pretty loudly into the microphone to make it work at all, but when you do your voice drowns out the "changed" voice coming out of the tinny sounding speaker on the other end.  And it may have a lot of switches to play with, but no matter how many different settings you try it just doesn't sound all that different.  My five-year-old son who loves everything electronic played with this for a few minutes and then forgot all about it.  It also takes a 9-volt battery, which is inconvenient when almost every other toy takes AA.  I wouldn't buy it.

title: A big hit
text: I got this for my two-year-old son after seeing how much he enjoyed playing with a similar tunnel another kid had.  And he loves it, it's a big hit.  It's durable and feels like it will last a long time.  It's very easy to open and close.  The flap on the end that allows you to connect with another tunnel is easily stowed out of the way by just pulling it back around the open end of the tunnel.  Nothing negative to say about it.  Just remember that it's 19 inches in diameter.  My kid is big for his age and is just the right size to fit in this tunnel.  The box says it's for "3 and up" but I wouldn't hesitate to get it for younger kids.

title: Good clean fun.
text: Rarely do I write reviews, especially positive ones, but this one deserves it. I purchased this product for my 3 year old niece so that she would have something to do at our big family Thanksgiving. She was excited as she looked forward to opening it (after 3 more bites of sweet potatoes). We unwrapped the box together as she sat on my lap. The first thing that I noticed was the multitude of colors -an almost overwhelming array- which immediately sparked creativity and imagination in both of us. She doesn't like to get messy. This is not at all the "messy" type of clay. It sticks to itself and nothing else (floor, tablecloth, hands and face). It even has a pleasant, almost cotton candy, aroma. I was so focused on the mindful, stress relieving activity of squishing and snapping the clay, I almost didn't notice the hilarity of what was happening all around the rest of the dining room table. Every member of my family, from age 3 to 66 was playing with the clay. There were enough individual packs to go around and we still have a few unopened colors to delve into next time we gather. The turkey was cooked perfectly, the butternut squash soup was delicious, and Lord knows I love that pumpkin pie; but, the real hit of the party was Sago Brothers Magic Clay.

title: No luck with any of the seeds
text:
This thing is not good for kids.

Even following the directions carefully, not a single seed sprouted, out of all the tons of different seeds it provides. Also, even if you do get seeds that work, remember that these plants grow agonizingly slow, and some require winter frost periods. These are not beginner plants. Research them!

I think next time I'll get a plant that is already started (1-3 year plant) and work with that since I know for sure I already have a plant that's alive and not dud seeds.

title: Adorable and Good Quality Sleeves
text:
I bought these sleeves along with the box for my boyfriend's Eeveelution deck. They are your usual Ultra Pro good quality sleeves. They are large enough that you can put perfect fit sleeves and then put the sleeved cards into these sleeves. They are adorable and good quality, although like most sleeves, if you play with them and shuffle a lot, the corners end up bent and split at the seams.

These are holding up very well so far after several games and they are adorable. I highly recommend them to any Eevee fans, especially with all the Eeveelution GX cards that have come out!

Still, it hasn't broken yet and is adorable. My boyfriend loved it!!

Of course, I'm just discovering all these problems when I checked the toy before wrapping for the holidays, and Amazon says I'm outside the return window.  I'm not giving this plastic noise-maker to a kid as a present, so I guess we'll just keep it as a toy to play with at Grandpa's house....

text:
This is big, and took my husband a while to use a bike pump to inflate this.
Don't think you will live through this inflating with your mouth.

We live on a river in Ca. And When the weather in Ca. Warms up the girls 6 and 8 yrs can't wait to use this float.
Although Not to float down the river, just to enjoy this in one big area on the river at our home.
I think this will last longer in a pool, but it's worth the chance for us.
This looks just like the pictures and the colors also.
This is not a heavy type of plastic, but the price is very reasonable. It's also not real thin either.
If your children can't swim this is not the float for them. This won't save there life, it might pop.

For the price, and design and hope it holds up 5 stars.

title: Cute bunnies and eggs for Easter egg hunt, Childs birthday to give other children gifts .
text:
The eggs are large, and the bunnies are adorable, and they seem well made.
The bunnies fit in the large eggs.
I would use these for a children's Easter egg hunt,
Birthday to give as gift to each child. The colors are Not fated out.
The bunnies are pink, blue and tan/ brown. Young Boys like these as well as the girls do .

title: Big, soft and cute. Does reflect at night. Made well, good price
text:
Big, squeeshy Dino.
My six yo. grand daughter loves these squashes, and this Dino is becoming her
Favorite one.
At light the fluorescent trim lights up a bit. Although the colors are not bright.
The sewing is done well, and is strong.
This is big, cute, and Soft.
Nothing not to like about this Dino, and the price is less then other ones she has
That are smaller.

title: Awesome toy to build, and play with
text:
This is a great toy if your child likes to build his own out door fun tractors etc.
it comes with all the parts, and remote control.
I was expecting my grandson to love this, and he doesn't, but sorry to say cause he doesn't want To bother putting it together, even with his mother or father to help him!
Putting this together is the fun part of this toy also.
He is 7 1/2 yrs.

title: Fun kit allot of pieces.
text:
This is a nice kit, and my 8 yr granddaughter is liking this.
There are 100s of pieces to this set, and I think this needs to be set up on a board ,
Or in a low box that can be put away with out disturbing what she has put together.
This castle is enchanting with all the cute pieces, but it does not go together in a day,
At least not in this house, there are other toys and things to do now that snow is here.
(Skiing).

title: The girls never get bored, use over a over again when you press the button.
text:
My 6 yr, and 8 yr old granddaughters love this set.
These 2 drawing boards can be used over, and over again. After you draw, or Write on this
Just press the button, it clears the board to start all over again, or if you make a mistake.
When you write the rainbow if colors come up.

This is a good toy to take on trips, to a waiting room, and give as a gift etc.
The girls never seem to get bored using these boards, and there is not any mess.

title: 6 & 8 yr love this kit.
text:
My two granddaughters , 6 and 8 love this.
The girls work well together and share, they like doing these types of sparkley gem art.
This keeps them busy on rainy snow days. They have been having fun with these little gems
For hours.
Makes a Friends fun Birthday gift.

title: Cute and cuddly
text:
Another soft cute huggable animal for a 7 yr old.
My granddaughter has allot of these types of toys. She loves this Octopus , and it has the features
Of the real ones, but cuter.
This is a good size, and she likes wrapping the legs around her. It's cuddley.

title: This has it all for a soft lovably sloth.
text:
This Sloth has it all.
It's soft , squishy, lovably, good size , the toes are adorable, and look at the face !
My 7 yr old granddaughter has allot of Squishy soft animals, and this is a much loved one.

This comes in plastic with all the air sucked out it. It does look like a road kill in a tight zip lock
I would not hand it too child like that, open it let it gets it full form, wrap in pretty tissue paper,
And put it in a fancy bag.

title: Great fun for kids that are curious, and like to get messy.
text:
This gross science lab I thought the 6 yr girl 7,yr boy and 8 yr girl old would Love this.
Sorry but these kids didn't like the yucky feeling of the experiments!! Go figure!
We all live in the mountains and have a river here that there in all summer, and they do
Play in the mud, and they like looking at all the bugs, also playing with the Animals.
But for some reason this was not for them!

I'm giving this a 4 star.
If anything changes here, I'll be back with a update.

title: Finally got this in the air.
text:
We are not experienced kite flyers, and every kite we have flown did not do good with us.
This kite comes with allot of kite string.
We took this to a open field and ran like hell to get this
Kite in the air. It was breezy outside.
It finally took off right before we where going to call this quits, with out crashing into the dirt,
Once it was in the air The 7yr old took the string pad and had a good time, but we had to control this kite he couldn't by him self.
The tail is long on this kite.

The different colors of greens look just like it does in Amazon. Nothing too exciting.
For kids they like dragons etc.

title: This kit comes with everything. 6 & 8 yr loved this kit. Never got bored
text:
My two granddaughters 6 and 8 yrs old where here for two days, and we went outside on the patio
For them to make these awesome fun useful Bird houses on the outdoor coffee table.
This kit comes with absolutely everything.
4 bird houses that snap together, a great assortment of colors of paint, brush's and with great ideas, everything to hang these. The instructions are complete.
After the kids had finished putting the bird houses together and before painting I put glue on the
Parts that snapped together so these would not come apart in the wind.
These bird houses are sturdy.
This bird house kit actually took them two days off and on to finish, paint and hang them on trees here ( I live on a few acres)
The kids love this kit and never got bored with it.

This kit makes a nice gift to give for a birthday, Xmas, Hanukah, just to give a boy or girl a gift.
Good price.

title: Fun for the 6 yr old, but not all pieces fit together perfect!
text:
My 6 yr old granddaughter is loving this type of dream castle.
The pieces are tiny like lego.
This set is fun for her, although I notice that not all the little pieces fit together perfect!
Some pieces are not big enough to fit together right, like a arm was too small. Maybe using a little glue
Would work to hold it in place!

There is the larger pink castle set that the 8 yr old is working on, and that seems
to fit together better so far.

For the price this is still fun for the 6 yr old.

title: 8 yr old is loving this. Pink Castle.
text:
My 8 Year old granddaughter loves this pink castle.
The parts are tiny as legos are, she spreads it across the table and is making a awesome
Little Castle with this.
You can make this huge or just use some of it to make your own creation.
This is a great price for this , There made well, and with detail.
Makes a nice birthday present for the kids friends, or for Xmas. Or just for kids to have a good time

title: 6 and 8 yr old are loving these, two tablets and 2 sticks come in the set.
text:
My granddaughters are 6 and 8 they love drawing with these tablets.
This set comes with two separate drawing tablets, and two drawing sticks.
The pages are black to draw on and all the bright good looking colors come threw when
You draw with the stick.
It's very creative what the girls and boys can draw with these.
The other side of the black page is white, and I notice it's not used!

There is not any mess using these, and no toxic smells. There easy to take on camping trips, flying, and vacations.
It gives the kids something to do and seems to quite them down.

Makes a good party friends gift , stocking stuffer, and to have on hand for rainy days.
I'm buying more of these.
5 stars.

title: 6 and 8 yr old having fun watching the crystals grow.  Good price
text:
This kit comes with two small crystals that do grow. The girl 6 and 8 have had other crystal grow kits
But they think this kit is more exciting, and crystals get larger then most other kits
Good price.

title: Hung this on a old swing. Kids are loving it.
text:
We hung this from a older swing, under a big tree , but took the other play equipment off first.
Now the kids will not be getting hurt from the other older play toys they out grew.
Three kids under 8 yrs play, swing and twirl on this , or just relax and talk, and
sometimes eat there lunch on this.

This is such fun time for the kids it is well worth it.
I want to say at first this was $57.99., then $77.99, then $67.99 where it looks like it's staying at ?

title: Soft, sewn very good, Joey comes out of pocket , good size
text:
My 5 yr old granddaughter said her dream was to go to the UK to see Kangaroos. We live in California.
When I saw this soft sewn Kangaroo with the Joey in the pouch I had to get it.
For the price this is nicer then I expected.
The Joey is even sewn very well, and a good size, also can be taken out of the pocket.

As my granddaughter said, this is Perfect.

title: The kids love this, and I like the feel also.
text:
Just got this, and the 5 1/2 yr old can't get enough of it. He had his 2 cousins come here so they all can play with this slimySand.

I brought out big cookie sheets with higher sides , and put paper on the floor in the kitchen,.
The kids all love this stuff, and I like playing with it.
It is not as icky messy as Slime is, and the kids like the rollers that come with this, and I gave them cookie cutters, and another rolling pin.
You can also store in plastic bags so it will not dry out.

This is great fun to bring out when it's raining outside, and for birthday gifts, and for holidays..
There are larger sets of SlimySand also.

title: 5 yr.old Love this set.
text:
Awesome LEGO set.
This did take a little extra time to build , but no big deal.
All the pieces were there, and they actually stayed together really well.

My five yr. old grandson Loves the Spidder-Man LEGO set.
Especially the spider webs that come with it, and the head.

title: Fun toy for 4 and 6 yr old. BIrd sings and repeats Your words
text:
This is actually a cute fun toy for the 4 yr.old, and the 6 yr likes it also.
There are not too many toys like this that I have found, that repeat what you say for a short time, and sing.

The bird is the size of a Parakeet, but the tail is not that long.
You pet the bird it sings, you then talk to in short words and it repeats.
The wings light up.
Its entertaining for the kids..

Makes a nice gift for the holidays, Birthday gifts to give.
For a girl, or boy

Does not give the price, so I Can't say its worth the price or not !

title: Colorful, fun for 6 yo.
text:
Mellissa and Doug have wonderful educational toys for children.
This cardboard floor 100 peice puzzle is one if them
Its colorful and fits together very good.

The 6 yr. has been doing puzzle since 3 yo, and love thus horse one.
Also the 4 yo is having fun with this one..

title: Works good, and 5 yo has allot of fun.
text:
My 5 yo grandson loves All nerf guns ( I'm not a fan of any gun for kids!)
He really loved this one because of the LIama targets and it's fortnite.
It only comes with 6 nerf rubber bullets, but trust me he has plenty of other rubber bullets.
No issues with the bullets jamming.
He uses his off brand bullets and they work just fine.
He's able to detach the barrel with no problems at all.
The LIama targets are great as well.

title: Great kit if your kids like Slime..
text:
This is a great kit, if your kids love Slime.
Every time my grandson can see Slime he's all over it. especially being able to make it.
No issues at all with this kit. Easy directions to follow.

I always lay something down on my granite counters, that is parchment paper, and I use masking tape to keep
It in one place,
We like to use slime for science experiments

If you don't like the slime texture it's not ideal for you at all.

title: The 5 yo loves this Fort Nite toy, and and wants more.
text:
Good toy for the kids that love Fort Nite.

This comes with one guy. You can buy extra figures for it on Amazon.
The small toys for the guys hands do fit properly.

This car has No problem rolling around on the carpet and hardwood floors, and my 5 yo grandson really likes this toy, and
Wants more.

title: Fun doll, walks and talk..
text:
This Giggle baby doll is more then I expected .
When you push on the tummy she has 25 + sounds, and phrases, her shoes light up.
When you give her the baby bottle put water in, and she pees..The 3 1/2 yo, and the 5 1/2 yo are loving her.
The 3 yo can wear the glasses.., there are a few accessories that come with her.
Batteries are already in this, but in the back is were to install more batteries if needed.

This makes a very nice Xmas , birthday, and hanukkah pressent, or just for the kids to have fun.

title: Cute mermaid costume..
text:
Such a cute fun mermaid costume.
It fits the 3 1/2 yo, and the 5 1/2 yo . Alhough fits the 3 1/2 yo better..The girls are having alot of fun with this cute costume.
Will also be fun for Halloween.

This is sleeveless with material covered elastic with the material ruffle , this is the reason this costume can fit different sizes.
This is comfortable to wear .
Buy it,, the kids will have allot of fun dressing up.

title: Hair has a nice scent, hair is soft and fun for the kids.All plastic doll.
text:
Cute all plastic doll with big eyes thst do not open and close!
Her hair is very soft and has a nice strawberry scent, but having her for a few weeks I notice the scent is fading.
She is not cuddly, but this doll is all about her soft hair that my 3 1/2 yr old Granddaughter loves to cumb, and style.

If your child will have fun playing with the dolls hair this is the doll for the child.

title: Original pokemon charactors.
text:
Neat toy for the Pokemon lovers.
It came with the stick that looks like fire. It goes in his mouth.
Doesn't make any noise, but a cool little toy.
My 5 yo Grandson loves it.
It's one of the original characters.

title: 4 medal and plastic  cool matchbox  Airplanes,
text:
4 different Airplanes as it said.
There the medal, and underneath there a hard plastic.
The 3 helicopters propellers on the top are plastic, the jet type of silver plane is more medal.

I remember when matchbox toys where all metal, not anymore!.

That said, the 5 yo loves these planes, along with other matchbox toys..
The kids can't get enough of these.

title: 6 yo put this together herself, and loves this miniature little fairy cottage.Comes complate.
text:
I grow gardens with miniature little scenes in them, so when my almost 6 yo granddaughter saw this , she was very excited, and
Knew exactly had to plant, and arrange everything by herself.
She also looked at the picture and put this kit together. There was a couple of times she was frustrated puting it together, she even glued a couple of peices to keep them in place.

Its been a few weeks now, and the seeds are coming up, which is very exciting for her.
That said, you might be better off buying a couple of packs of herbs for the kids to plant, cause they grow fast, and you can cut off the tops and use them for seasoning when cooking, or in a salad. That gets the kids really excited to be able to grow something to eat..
Although now thinking about it, I don't think this type of plastic is healthy and to grow food in üòù..

title: These all fell off when we woke up in the morning!
text:
I Had a hard time sticking the Planet Stickers to the ceiling and walls.
I pre cleaned the walls and still was having some troubles.
They do glow in the dark and can see them well.
But when we woke up, all the planets have fallen off the wall.
The 5 yr old was disappointed, and so was I.

2 stars cause they glowed.

title: 4 yr old loves these, helmet comes off, as visor does .legs, arms move.
text:
Another Toy Story, and this is a big hit with the 4 yr old.
The helmet comes off, and so does the vizor. The arems and legs move, or Duke Caboom just stands .
When he opened the box he knew exactly what The figures are, and has not stopped playing with them.

Duke Caboom is very funny for this looks, but looks just as the movies, as does Forky.

title: 5 star, but the lid on top doesn't close tight!
text:
The Fortnite water gun was a Big hit with my 4 1/2 yr old grandson, ( he is a big boy and can handle this big water gun ) and even a bigger hit with the adults..
We have been having allot of rain in Ca, but then the sun come's out, and along with it is this water gun.
We live on a river, and the kids can't wait for the summer to play in the river with this gun, if the adults don't get it first, or we have to get another one.

The only thing about this water gun, is the lid on top of the tank doesn't close all the way. So when you hold up in the air, water spills out.
Although it is a water toy, make sure you empty the water completely out or it will leak out.
It does shoot really Far, and is pretty accurate. My four 1/2 year old grandson has no problem using it.

title: 4 yr old Loves this, get the extra battery .
text:
My grandson is 4 yrs old and loves this watch!
Just make sure you get the extra battery, because it stays on one mode only, but when you get the new battery it explains exactly what to do to set up the watch.

He loves the games on it. It's light weight. The only problem is the band, it pops off the wrist every once in awhile.

title: 4 yr old has fun learning math with this game.
text:
My grandson loves this game.
He is four years old, and loves the adding part of the game.
I think it's very helpful for learning numbers and math.
It's small and easy to pick up the game and put away, and you can take it camping. or
friends house.

title: Not huge beads, but allot of beads, kids are having fun with this set.
text:
This is a nice set with allot of pieces for the 3yr, and 5 yr old. There having allot of fun with this set.
The beads are not huge, but there easy to handle for the girls. Boys can play with these also. Its good for
Small motor skills for small hands.
Good price.
Makes a nice gift, good for rainy days, and days that are just too hot to play outside.
This set is BPA Free.

title: Adorable, the 3 and 5 yr old this..
text:
This little Lego set is so cute.
It is small, but the girls love it. 3 1/2 and 5..
The kids put the jewelry box together, and it holds all the cute goodies that come with this..Or they can use it for there own Jewelry, and special things.

Good valuse.

title: Fun set for 4 yr old, And fun for All ages. Love this set.
text:
Even though this is a magnet set for young children it is pretty strong, and it is for young and older people.
I'm even having fun with this set.

The 4 yr old plays with this set for hours, and goes around checking everything to find out if it magnetizes .
The peices are marked N & S on them.
The magneted wand is the largest, and strongest of all the magnets.

It says there is 39 pieces to this set, but that includes the small magnetic discs that are fun to use with the wand, but
I would not count them .
The larger pieces are what I count and there are 9, plus the string, and that does include the package of small discs.

Makes a fun and educational gift for a child, or anyone.

title: 3yrs, and 5 yrs love this set. cute, and small.
text:
This is an adorable Disney Cinderella set, but small..
Although for the price it is fun for the girls to put together, and play make believe with this set.
The coach and all the 3 yr. and the 5 yr love.
There is cute detail with the coach, and all the parts to this set.

title: 4 yr old Loves the Maga man
text:
Seems to be made well.
Not sure what this means to be ‚ÄúFully Charged‚Äù as nothing happens with this excepts the body pulls apart!

The 4 yr old knows about this figure and loves it.
Everything comes apart easy, and he pushes it back on, and does different playing with the mega man.

title: Huge large blocks, fun family game.
text:
We are loving this huge Jenga game.
All the blocks came in well made, and cut straight. The bag these came in Is sewed well, but don't know how long its going to hold up for! If you have a extra heavy square duffle bag it will hold this game.
These blocks when All stored in the bag is very heavy.

This is not for younger children , as it says it's for 12 yrs and up. After playing this heavy Jenga game I can understand.
When the blocks fall, get out of the way.

title: Fun for the 4 yr old, keep a stock of batteries
text:
This car is fast.
We live in the mountains, and finally a fun car for the 4 yr old.
He runs this car in the dirt and the drive way. It flips over, and keeps right on going.
The wheels do not turn.

The only problem is, the battery's do not last long for him, so we keep
A stock of costco batteries, no problem then, and he is happy.

title: The Black Panther cruiser is amazing, Goes fast, wheels turn etc
text:
I thought this was a neat toy car for the 4 yr old, and he is loving this..
Pretty sturdy and goes pretty fast. The front wheels turn, so you can make it go in all the direction, and back it up.

It didn't come with batteries but it's easy to put the 5AAA batteries in.
I would recommend when not being played with, to turn the car and remote switch to off so it doesn't drain the batteries. It's light weight too, and
Will will work on the carpet, but on the wood floor its goes fast.

title: Allot of fun,and the girls are lovin it..
text:
Adorable two seater Jeep with bright colors made by power wheels. The assembly took a little over two hours. Was not hard to do, as long as you follow the directions.
I like how when your foot goes off the gas pedal the Jeep stops. It goes thru the gravel and dirt no problem.
The back of the Jeep has quite a bit or room so the kids can store stuff in there for their adventure. It makes noises too which is fun for the kids.

The two girls are loving this Jeep

title: Great learning memory toy..
text:
What a fun game to get your young child's memory to recognize different little figures this comes with, when it drops down out of the Un-Oh Hippo mouth.
There is different section in the Hippo's mouth, when it closes and comes back, a children has to guess what is missing.

The 3, 4 and 5 yr old really like this game which surprised me !.
They do not argue over this game, they have fun, and are learning to remember what was there, and now its not..

Fun learning toy for a gift, and holidays also.

title: Nothing much in this set.
text:
Crayola color set, 91 different types of crayolas, with 1 Small tablet of 5x7 paper, and 1, small 5 x 7 of a size simple coloring tablet.
Comes with a large plastic container to hold this. There is Allot of extra space in the container to hold allot of other
Things you can put in this.
Comes with a small boxes of crayons,,

That said I was expecting a nicer larger assortment of drawing, art supplies then what this came with.
You can go to the Dollar store and get all this and more for $10.00...

title: Cute set, with shoes and back pack, feet move..
text:
My Grand daughters 3, and 5, love these Calico critters school friends.

This came at a good time when the 5 yo was just starting school for the first time, and she could relate to this set.
With this set you can dress them with shoes, back pack, clothes and all, there little feet move...

This set will also go with there little grocery store..

title: Dressed so cute..
text:
Adorable Calico Critters Cat family.
My Grand daughters 3, and 5 are in love these Little guys, and girls.
This will go nice with there little grocery store.
There dressed so cute..

My box came in crushed but the Critters are ok..
I know most love these cute little critters, but there hard and not cuddle.

title: This a cool Mustang convertible, Kids Love it.
text:
A fun two seater sporty Convertible Mustang car that is very cool for the kids to drive around.
This is a Big hit with the 3, 4 and 4 yr old, although not all 3 can fit into this car at one time..Two can fit at a time. We also have a motor cycle for the kids,
so they can share.

The wheels are a hard plastic, and does not work well on dirt drive way..
We live in the mountains in Ca.This does ride better on our walk way, or on our road outside of our gate where its black top.
Or the kids ride on our walk ways.
I'm thinking of putting this in my Suv and taking it to the track at school, but charging it first so it goes for a couple of hours.

It's an easy assembly IF you Follow the directions.
I would start charging the battery first so when you're done putting it together your little one can drive alone.

In the winter this will be stored in our garage..
5 star.

title: Creative fun toy.
text:
Great Fun for the 3 and 5 yr old girls...But this is also for a boys ..The 4 yr old Boy likes this also, and sure decorates different, and does Not want a pink room, house to live in ..Maybe this set could have more boy things in it !

Find a wall the kids can leave this on for awhile. They keep rearranging the rooms with different stickers and how they want it..
This set is fun, and encourages kids to arrange a home that feels fun and good for them..Maybe parents need
To take a look at what, and how expressive there children are, what they want there room,home to look like!
Look for there safe place!

I recommend this creative toy.
This makes a good Birthday present, Hanukkah , and Christmas present that children can be creative with, share, and have fun..

title: 3 & 4 yr old loves these..Does not come with any Critter,,
text:
So darn cute for the 3 & 4 yr old. They love the little Calico critters they have also.
This little grocery market set does Not come with the Critters, buy those separately.
I think this is for kids with little fingers, cause the products that come with this are tiny.

The girls set this up together looking at how the picture showed, and how the market they go to
Has done it also, but with mom doing a little supervising.
Mom helped with all the stickers this comes with.

Makes a nice Birthday present, XMas present , and Hanukkah present, or cause your children have fun with Calico Critters.

title: No holes in beads , can't make jewelry !
text:
This is a set to place these beads on a section to be creative and make animals or different designs.
It does come with everything to to do this.
But my disappointment is , as its also the 3, and 5 yo.
I thought the beads would have have Holes in them so the girls could also make Jewelry with this set.
No holes to strings, so they are bored.

title: Such a fun Turtle tank..Kids Love it.
text:
That is a Great toy if your kids are into the Teenage Mutant Turtles, and the 4 yr is..
This a good size Turtle tank, not a mini, The gate in the back comes down , the top comes up to shoots out projectile.
the tank changes different ways.
Transforms to mobile OPS Unit. The cab flips open etc.

The 4 yo loves this, but his sister 3 & 5 also do, and they all three can play together with this Tank.
Its a 5 star.

title: Nice size Pappa Pig..clothes are cute..Mine does not talk!!!
text:
Cute set of Peppa Pig that talks.
She has her Tu Tu on with a her Crown,
Comes with a Rain coat, boots and rain hat. shoes, sun glasses etc.
Comes with allot of stickers. 3 yr old likes this.

When you press her tummy she talks. Mine does Not talk, or say a word!!!

title: Cute Pappa Pig set. Kids are having fun with it.
text:
All three of the children here Love Peppa Pigs.
There age is 3, 4, & 5.. two girls, and the one boy 4yrs,

This Fire station , and fire truck was bigger then I expected it to be, but its not huge. The fire truck has ladders, that come off, and its decorated cute..
The top of the fire truck you pull up. There is one pig that is inside the truck.
And One Pig is in the top of the look out tower. Inside the fire house , and there is a lever you push down,
and it brings up the peppa pig inside the tower to the top where there is plastic windows that covers the top of the tower.
Its does not fit all that good, but the kids like it.

Inside the fire house is a table with a red plastic phone attached, and one drawer that you push down, and it
opens. On the outside of the drawers, there are pictures on it, of fire hats, Axes..

The kids are having fun with this Peppa Pig fire station, and there sharing it !
This is all plastic, and the tires on the fire truck move..

title: Our Kids Love all Thomas & Friends toys, this one is fun
text:
Another toy set to the series of the mini Thomas and friends.
Comes with two minis and Harold the Helicopter. Comes with three ramps to set up and shoot the minis around the track. You can buy the other sets and collect them all.
We did buy more Minis so all the kids can play together.

The assembly is not hard either, just follow the directions.

The 3,4,5 yr old are all having fun with this Thomas and Friends.
5 Star

title: Always something for the kids to busy here & learn.
text:
Fisher price activity center

This is The ultimate activity center!

Most children seem to have a small interest into toys after a period of time. Not with this.
Has numbers, shapes, music, work area, and different colors for the children to learn from. It's big enough for all three of my young grandkids to play together.
The buttons are not hard to find to turn on or off. Lots of lights and music to go with it as well.
This has become there ultimate favorite toy..It does everything.

The directions are not hard to follow , but it took a little time to put together.
Keeps the little ones busy for a long time, and does not bore them, as there is always something for them to do on this set.

This is a Absolute 5 Stars, and will last a Long time..

title: Kids got along and liked this game.
text:
Fun first game for the 3, and 5 yo to play together, and get along!
The kids had fun with this Critters closet after we laid everything out for then to understand the game.
Parents can play this game with the children.
You dress up the cards, and interchange them with the other players cards. you can add you own dress up.
Give the other child time to figure out what the other child dressed your card with.
its that basic..Although might seem complicated to another child at first.

Don't know how long this is going to last, and keep everything together!

4 stars.

title: Creative for 3, 4, & 5 yo loved this set. Buy more brushes.
text:
This is a great set to keep the children busy on a rainy day, or any day also.
The 3, 4, and 5 yr old painted for hours. Buy more brushes.
This set comes with 5 plaster pets as shown on the box ready to paint. I don't know what 5, ‚Äú3D‚Äù pets mean!
Comes with Glitter glue sparkles in two nondescript colors.
Comes with a good assortment of color paint for the kids to be creative painting the animals..
After The 5 yr old, painted the animals, she also painted flowers on the kitty, and hearts on the animals etc., and the two other ones followed her with the look they wanted. The boy did cars etc..

The paint containers lids snap off in front, and on, and can be kept pretty good for another day to use them.
This makes a nice B-day party gift, Christmas, Hanukkah, or what ever you celebrate, or just fun for the kids.

This was packaged good, but be careful unwrapping the animals.
5 star, because the children had allot of fun with this, it was creative, and its all in one box, except you might want to buy more brushes.

title: 4 yr. old Loves this set.
text:
My Grandson 4 yrs, loves PJ mask, especially Catboy.
This toy is unique because conner can be turned into cat boy by pushing the button.
It spins around in the inside. The other characters don't come with it, but you can purchase them
separately.
Keeps the child occupied while playing with the figure set.

title: Its a Party float..Love it
text:
The Franklin pool /river float is BIG, clear plastic, with big flat silver sparkling things in it that move around.
Its a Party Float.
The plastic is stronger then I expected for a price of under $8.00..
It did take awhile to blow this up, its for the young to do..
I live on a river in Cal. in the summer once a week, we have our kids little friends (25 to 40 people) over on the river sandy beach, to play and float in the river. Children have to wear life vests, parents have to watch them, and we do put up a line that stops the kids from floating down river.
This float has been so much fun, and does stay afloat
Not sure how long this is going to last, but for the summer which is almost over, its great.

For the price, you can't beat it, and we are having so much fun using this float.
Everyone has remark about, where did you buy that float at...Amazon of course.

4 stars, its takes allot to blow this up..Use a pump!

title: Fun light up toy
text:
When my 4 yo grandson comes over this has become one of his favorite toys.
The tigerbot is a great toy that lights up and makes noises and has different features so the kids will love it. You can also purchase different characters and build them together. It's not that heavy. I would recommened this toy to anyone.

title: Need a card table to fit. Cute print.
text:
The print is a really cute jungle print scene on this, and the 4 yr was very excited to get inside his tent, fort.
The material is kind of thick, but slippery.

This fort is to be used on a Card Table, which I do not have.
I tried it over two chairs but it would not cover it right, it would hang and slip off when he moved in this.
Then I put it over the dinning room table, knowing it would just cover 3 sides of it. That didnt work well either.
As my table is a Trestle table and does not have the regular 4 legs...

Although this is colorful, and cute, I think it would have been more use-able if it was larger, and the material not as slippery.
We are back using a dark sheet!

If you have a card table, or the measurments for a table of that size, this will be fun for 2 or 3 small kids..

title: Does not look as picture shows, comes in plain br. Box, Girls love this.
text:
I Was surprised to see the way this was packaged, very misleading, and cheesy looking.
You pull the head out of a plain brown box, and in a side type of brown cardboard is the little
Plastic bag that has the assortment Of everything that comes with this.
Does not make this like a gift at all. Takes away the fun of a child to open this.

That said its a Barbie head from under her chest, looking like she is resting on her elbows with her hands on top of the other that moves at the elbows. The hands do not move, just at the elbows.
Inside the box is a a white sheet if paper that shows directions on how to use what is in the plastic bag.
This is what this comes with, and its all plastic.
Styling head.
Plastc brush.
Curling iron.
3 Barrettes.
8 Gems.
Hair extension.
3 Elastcs.
2 nail wheel.
Nail polish bottle.
Sticker sheet.
Ring with snap in gem.

The 5yr old Loves Barbie and does love fixing her hair, and playing a little with her nails. The nails are very small.
The hair is soft, and both girls (5 &, 2 1/2 ) are having fun with this Barbie, but I have to say, where disapointed at first by the packaging.
The doll is a hard plastic

title: Its a pull toy, eyes move, top come off..
text:
Well made as Fisher Price toys usually are.
Not sure what station wagon this was supose to be, but its cute enough, the kids do not know any different.
Has a very short pull string on the front of the car. I tied on a thicker and much longer string on the front of the car, behind the front wheels. Although for a young child the short string is not dangerous.
When this is pulled the blue eyes go up and down. If you put two of the figures in the back seats, they go around
when its pulled, like there looking around. The front passenger seat does not move, Why?
The top comes off, and the back part like a station wagon would do , comes up, or down, which does not make any sense the way this one works.
I personally thought this reproduction car would be more true to life back n the 60s.

I do not understand why this is called the Family Wagon, when there is not a child in this set!
It comes with a women, A Man, & a Dog! The 4 yr old questioned, wheres the kid?
The younger child liked this, and even the 4 did, but he played using his transformers with this.

This toy is more for a 8 mo. Old, and children that are just walking to pull this with them,, It's a pull toy.
Does not make any noise.

title: Cute, needs 2 AAA Batteries .
text:
All our kids love Thomas Trains sets, including the Cartoons. The ages are 2 1/2, 4, and 5 yrs old.

This is a cute set, but it can get a little boring just watching this go around in circles.
But this is what makes it different.
When Thomas gets off the boat, you have to be quick to get the boat back to the beginning of the water part, so
Thomas can get on the boat again to bring it to the other side where the tracks are. Etc.

When Thomas is on the plastic water he is rocking back and forth. The kids like that.
Would be better if there was a bridge or something more then just circling all the time, and more tracks..
All new toys kids are excited About, Not sure how long the kids are going to be playing with this toy!

You can put thomas on a flat floor and it goes also.
I found it odd, that there was nothing on the box, or in the description that I could find,That you need 2 AAA batteries.
So, be ready.

title: 5 yr old is happy. It's Ok!
text:
This is cute for the 5 yr old , and to spend time with the child working with her to plant flowers , and be
Creative with this.
It's all plastic parts that seem a bit cheesy, but kids do not know it!

It comes with just about everything you see on the box, But you will need to buy small plants, and a little more dirt.
Buy flowers that do not grow big. Keep it small, and little.
I'm still looking for plants that grow small mini flowers. ( fake flowers might work with real plants!)
You might want to buy some little rocks. I found some at the dollar store.

The cute part of this is the unicorn horse, with the fairy, and little turtle I think.
A bit pricey !
Makes a cute gift .

title: The kids love this scary Dino..
text:
The 2 1/2 yr old, 4yr. and 5 yr old, cannot get enough of this toy.
When the car goes the Dino runs after it,. Put the guy in the car , or on the Dinos back.
The Dino runs on the carpet pretty good and the kitchen floor..
The Dino can run at two speeds, regular, or fast. .Dinos legs pedel the wheels like crazy, as the kids say.
And that Dinos Roaring is great fun, and the kids in front run faster.

This is a activity toy, as the kids are always in motion running around with this Dino.
The Dino looks scary too the kids, with the eyes, mouth roaring, and showing teeth, and what kid does not like scary!, They all do

title: Cute Barbie set ?
text:
This is a simple Pink Barbie car, and Basic Barbie doll, with her sun glasses on her head. Very cute.
I think the car is a good size. Is Not remote. Push the car playing make belive.
My 5 yr old loves this set, and has added it to her big Barbie house, and her other two barbie houses
She has set up.

I do not know how old children are that keep playing with Barbie's! That said my 2 1/2 and 5 yr olds love this set.
She is not into being fussy about quality of her toys. She just knows what she likes, and has fun.

title: Great summer toy.
text:
Well made thick plastic water and sand toy.
There are so many goodies in this water toy..

We live on a river with a sandy beach. This is the perfect summer toy for the 4 1/2, 3 1/ 2, & 2 1/2 yr old, and older Children.
Also Great fun for the kids small pool toy, and bath toy..

I was not expecting such a large toy, and even the truck is not small, and the other parts to this.
17 inches high, 10 inches wide.
On the top there is a turn key to open this, so the water and sand will go threw.

Excellent water toy for $8.65 Prime.

title: Portable, fun, good price.
text:
Cute Barbie castle that the 2 1/2 and 4 1/2 are having so much fun playing , and sharing with this.
Comes with the puppy that had her/ his own slide,and cloud to sit on going up,the elevator, or Barbie can sleep with.
The Barbie bed opens , and there is a chair throne for her to sit on also.

What is fun is, there is so much on this for the kids to make up there own make- believe.
This little set comes with everything, except Barbie. Although the girls have other barbies to play with this.

Another plus is, this folds up, and the kids can take this on vacation with them to play with in the
Evning before bed., or take to grandma, and friends house.

Price is good for what you get in this set.

title: Comes with batteries, music, water boiling etc.  You will not be disappointed.
text:
I had my doubts about about this Tea Set! But No more.
This is So darn Cute, far better then what I expected, and it's Magical for any child.

When you lift the lid up, you hear water boiling, put the lid back down, and it starts to Whistle.
Then you press the middle of the flowers üå∏ it plays music.
The one on the right plays, Looking for a Friend.
The middle flower plays, I'm a little tea pot.
The flower on the left plays, Lulala.
There is a button on the lower right, that is the on & off switch.

The colors are cute, and comes with two plates, for your Tea cups with two cute flower spoons,
Or you can use the plates for the ice cream cones this comes with.
You could also give the children real ice cream cones and sit them on the plates.

Comes with the batteries installed underneath.

My two grandaughters are 2 1/2 , and 4 1/2,. I can't tel you how they love this Tea set, and play made believe back and forth.
It's made out of a strong plastic.

Battat toys has been new to me, but I have been buying Battat toys for the boys, and all there toys have held up Very good..
Great price for this tea-set

You will not be disappointed.
Would like to give this 10 stars.
Btw, there is not any glitter on this..Whew..

title: Soft, fluffy. Washed and dried in the dryer-no problem.
text:
Soft and fluffy.
The baseball pillow is about 15 inches across. Is not round like a baseball, but more flat like a pillow, but
Still mushy.
Has red baseball stitching only on one side of the pillow.

My 3 1/3 yo grandson is a baseball kid like his father is, so this pillow was a big hit.
Also he is into throw and catching but not good at it. This pillow He can catch easy in the house, and he throws it
Back to me, he is proud of himself.

Before giving this to my 3 1/2 yr old grandson to take a nap with the baseball pillow, I put it in my frontloader washer ,
Then put it in the dryer with a dryer sheet. Came out soft, and did not take forever to dry, still looked like new.

I think its sewn pretty good, and should last awhile.
I noticed the other sports pillows from this seller are $16.99, but I do not see a price for this pillow!
At that price, I think its a bit pricey!

title: Fun for about 5 and up. The box should be changed to make this more boy friendly.
text:
Cute idea my 4 1/2 yr old Granddaughter. She loves jeweler, crafting, and now she can wear what she makes.
It can be a little tricky for her to wrap the gems for a necklace, but her mommy helps.
It gives them a fun mommy and me time together.
She had so much fun breaking the purple mold that has about 4 gems in it..

That said, I do not think this is only for girls, and the box can be more boy color friendly.
I notice allot of young boys are wearing shells, rocks, gem stones wraped in leather around there neck.

title: Everything you need for sand and water toys.
text:
This Battat little wagon could not have come at a better time.We live on a river in California with a sandy beach.
This is cute and the perfect size for the, 2 1/2, 3 1/2 and 4 1/2 yo..
There pulling this behind them, and its not falling over threw the dirt as there walking to the river, or playing with this
in there small plastic pool.

Battat Toys Wavy Wagon B. Travel Beach, Translucent Sea, 9.5 x 14 x 8
- Bucket with sand sifter
- Wagon with handle
- 3 nesting cups with shark lid
- Fishy sand mold, rake, trowel and a boat
There is nothing else I have to buy for sand and river toys..This all comes in the Wagon.

The kids and I, are loving Battat toys as they are holding up longer then there other fun toys.

5 stars.

title: Works better then we thought, we mainly use them , not the kids!
text:
Thought this would be fun for the kids, but after getting these Walkie Talkies to work, my husband and I are using them.
I live on a few acres in the mountains in California on a river, and we have allot of trees around us.
We do get good reception with our cell phones, but those have gotten bigger, have lost them before, and these Retevis kids walkie talkies are smaller to put in my pocket etc..
They work very good to our surprise.
That said, yes the kids do take them when there on the river, and in the house..

I would get these again..So far so good..

title: Works pretty good for kids, There happy with this sometimes!
text:
Interesting toy for the 3 1/2 and 4 1/2 yr old. The 2 1/2 is too young for this.
Both the kids have the Kidnoculars and like those, as they see us use our adult ones all the time.

Now the GeoSafari is a whole different breed so to speek.
This one is heavier, you have to move the lenses in and out, and not so sure the kids like it, as they
Go back to the kidnoculars, or there just use to using those!

That said we live on a few acres, ans there ia allot for them to see here.
What they do like these for, when all the catapiller's recently where crawling all over before making there cocoons ..
The kids where on the ground and in the bushes with this over the catapillers, which did look bigger..
As adults our eyes focus different through this, then the children's eyes, and they do see thing better then we do using this.

The children like wearing this around there neck, it gives them hands free. If this gets cought up, it will break away and Not choke them.

title: Fun, no batteries,
text:
My 3 1/2 yr old grandson is having allot of fun with this Derby racing set.
This does not use batteries , the game plays using a knob you turn, and the cars go crazy.
Has background goodies to make this look like a race track which makes this look like fun for the kids.

Only comes with one car. I would say if the child doesnt have any cars for this game, buy more cause it makes it more fun.
This is a good toy to take with you to the park or traveling, it folds up with cars.

Good price,Fun, 4 star.

title: Jumps around , 3 1/2 likes it.
text:
First off, I was disappoint this is so small compared to the picture this showed!
That said, my 3 1/2 grandson thought this is a riot when it jumps in the air.He could not
Stop laughing. I think he likes the scare factor at first!
He likes anything that morphs into somthing , or goes crazy, as this does.

Its a ok toy, and he still is not bored with it.

title: Great for the kiddos pool and river also. Love this toy.
text:
The 3 1/2 has the larger Jet that came in a larger set. Neediness to say when he saw this one he was over excited.
This is Not only for the bath , but for the kiddos play pool since he was squirting it all over the bathroom in his excitement!
The two colorful cups load the water inside to be like a squirt gun when you pull the back part back, then in.
When his two cousins came over 2 1/2 & 4 1/2 in the play pool they all went screaming with excitment playing and grabbing for jet.

I'm going to have to buy two more, so they can all have fun with this in the pool.
We also live on a river, the shallow part is perfect for the kids to play with this also..
Since its not always going to be played with in the tub, if it leaks a bit, I'm not concerned about that..it's a water toy.

Rolls good on the floor also. Its a all a round toy.
No batteries needed..Yay.
This is a 5 star

title: This is Big, and fun if your a fan, and also like to play make believe..
text:
If your a fan of Jurassic world , or a kid that likes to play make-believe they will have fun with this Mosasaurus.
He/she is Big. Has a rubber type texture skin, The top of his back looks and feels like a Alligator. You can squeeze the sides in.
This does not take any batteries, and doesn't really do anything. You open and close the Big mouth , that has a animal √ølife like
Type of Pink color inside the mouth with hard rubbery teeth.

After snaping part of the body and tail on, then trying to snap on the fins till they snap in place , which was a little
Hard to do, but keep working on it, till you hear the SNAP.

My grandson who is 3 1/2 loved this Big Mosasaurus to play with an other of his larger Dinosaur transformer with this.
He is a child that likes to play make-believe with a few toys together.
Not sure if you can take this toy in the bathtub? If you can, that would be great.

I think this is pricey for a toy that doesn't do much on its own.!

title: Not that big, and was too easy.
text: I thought this was going to be bigger and a challenge for a 3 1/2 yr old girl. It was too easy for her.

title: Kids love it, it swims around the tub. Update. Pull string does not work after 2 weeks.
text:
Update. This did Not last long, only two weeks. Pull string is now stuck half way out. Does not work.
Going from a 5 star, to a one star..
-------------------
What a cute colorfull bath toy that does what its suppose to do.
Pull the light string on the top of his head, and the flippers have him swiming around the tub,
I would like it better if the string was longer, and so would the 2, 3, and 4 yr old.
But this is still a 5 stars.

title: Cute and easy to put together for young children. 2 & 4 yr love this set.
text:
Cute set for younger children, as the pieces are too big to put in there mouth.
All pieces are plastic,as is the hair on the princess. I personally think it would have been more fun for the kids if it was
Hair they could brush And braid!
The pieces are not hard for younger children to figure out, and they have fun building this,.
The bed comes with a little material cute cover, and the princess has a material skirt to put on.

title: Kids love this, is easier to work with, and organic.
text:
Comes in 4 primary colors.
Its softer then other types of play dough the kids have used before.
The 2 1/2 & 4 1/2 old girls love this Green toys dough.
They make cakes, animals and who knows what else, but it is easy for them to have allot of fun with this,and
There very proud of what they have made.
Make sure after the kids are finished playing with this its put back in th√© containers to stay fresh.

The flour in this is Orgainc , and packaging is bio-degradable. Yay.

title: Should have come with the right pencils, or its useless.
text:
I was not sure what I was getting when I ordered this..This is Not inspiring for me!
This would have been better if it was a little more money, but came with crayola's that this needs to be useful !
Since I'm not familiar with this, Now I have to figure out what crayola's / pencils I I need to buy for this!

Its a tablet that shows different ways of writing to be more creative.Has cray and black thickish paper .
On some of the paper there is black drawings, and with the right color pencils you can fill those in , like a
Coloring book.

I think this is for children, and they would have fun doing some creative drawing.
That said, buy the right pencils for this before giving it to anyone, so they can have fun..

title: A fun transformer, that is easy for the 3, and 4 yr. love this Robot, made well, feels good in the hands.
text:
I didn't receive the Jeff Super Wings! I received Jeff Super robot suit transforming vehicle.
Which is so much fun for the 3 & 4 yr old. Boy and Girl.
This also comes with a small jet plane that attaches to the top that comes off easy.
Its light Weight.but this is a great fun tranformer that is easy to transform.
It transforms into the Robot, into a car, then into a standing toy.
When you push the number button a little siren noises come on, and other sounds.

This is a big hit with the childern at my house

title: 3 Adorable forest dolls, and there pets
text:
This is called the Enchantimals Friendship set.
Three adorable and different forest dolls with there play pets.
The first doll on the left in the box is Patter Peacock with her feathers on her back, with her little blue bird animal friend Flap.
The middle doll is Lorna Lamb with her little cute sheep friend, Flag. They both have big sheep hair.
The doll on the right is Bree Bunny and her cute bunny friend Twist.

These are happy forest doll friends. There petite dolls that you have to be gental with. Not toss around, but make
Made believe with.
There three girls are dressed cute with there th√®me. There 6 inch tall and there little animal Friends seem more sturdy then the dolls.

To four yr old is more gental with the dolls and is having fun with them.
The 2 yr old follows what the older one does, but she has to be watched with dolls, cause she can
Break a arm etc.
There fore I think thus is for a 4 yo and up.
There is a few cute fun toys to add to this .

I like these dolls cause there different, and cute.

These make a nice Birthday gift, Xmas, etc.

title: Nice 5 car Pixar set.  kids are happy they collect these.
text:
Great set of the Disney Pixar cars. 5 Die-cast cars in set.
All 5 cars have a good weight to them, and are big enough for little or big hands.
The wheels move good. Look the same as the movie. Good detail.

In this box is :
Chick Hicks with Headset.
Taco.
Fabulous Lighting McQueen.
Jackson Storm.
Aaron Clocker.

The kids collect these, and these are the ones they didn't have.
We save the nice heavy box , and its packaged good.
The 4 yr. and 8 yr are having a good time playing with these, and adding to there collection.

title: Cute, does not come with Barbies. everything closes up in the house, was a good toy to take on vacation.
text:
This is a cute little Barbie vacation type house.
Comes with everything you see, except Barbie.
Some of what you see is stickers, and the backing is cardboard!
There are allot of liitle pieces. The 2 & 4 yo. Love this set, but they need to be careful not to step on the toys in this.
I put this on the coffee table, and nothing gets stepped on, by the kids, dogs, or there 3 yo brother, who also
Likes to play with this.
Since there is such liitle pieces with this, keep it away from little kids, and puppys.
Everything fits inside the house when it's closed up.

Just went on a short vacation to the beach for 3 days, and this was the perfect toy to take (besides beach toys).
This is compact, easy to store and does not take up allot of room.
When open there is allot to play with.

title: Fun toy, should have come with more then One truck.
text:
Fun toy for the 3 yr old boy, but the 2, & 4 yo,girls are having fun with it also.

This took awhile to put together. I think if my hubby was handy it would have been easier.
That said it was worth the time.
The kids are having allot of fun with this.
Although this should have come with more then One truck! We have other blaze trucks, but they do not fit this!
Si the kids for now are using hot wheels!

The waterfall is plastic, and the kids put alittle water on it. Don't do it!
There is a hiding caves, and stunts, and allot if make believe for the kiddos.

title: Amazing fun easy microscope with bugs ect. Talks, explains everything to the kids.
text:
Although this a 5 star, it is different then what I expected, but better, and smarter for young children.
The 2, 3, and 4 yr. love this learning toy. Keeps them buzy, and they have learned allot.

We have messed around with microscopes before trying to find dead bugs ect. to put on the glass slide .
No more do you have to do that for young children.
This comes with bugs ect. pictures on the slides, 3 pictures on each Plastic slide. There is a little slide drawer with all the pictures on them.
That Keeps this neat and organized .
Tell the kids, Do NOT put there little fingers on the slides or they will smudge them. Hold the plastic slides on the side edge.

No more having young children to focus there one eyes. The Kiddos can see out of both eyes. Focusing magnifier is 5X.
You need 3 AAA batteries, press ON, and Bindi Irwin ( her father was the Crocodile hunter) will tell you All about the bugs, animals
Your child is looking at.
There is a fact button, answer button, even a Quiz button, and sound can be adjusted.

All the kiddos Love this learning toy.
This also makes a very good Birthday day present, Xmas, or just getting the young kids a very good educational learning toy.
I recommend this Talking Microscope .

title: This is simple, and kids love learning with this toy.
text:
This is one of the more fun learning games for children to learn there ABCs, how to Associate letters with sounds of little
Toys that match up inside the acorn.
Take off the acorn top, find the little toy that matches up the color and letter.

The 2, 3 & 4 yo do Not get frustrated with this toy. When they take the lid off the acorn they feel they won a reward. Its a great way for
Kids to match it all up.
Good for Language, spelling , learning letters, and to count using this also.
If you have young kiddos that put little toys in there mouth be careful.
5 stars

title: Children get bored. Should have come with animals not pictures.
text:
The barn is cute. The top barn shutters open, and also the barn doors.
The kids like pushing down on the silo for the circle around the barn that spins around, that holds
The game peices. When it stops in the front that is the animal that goes in the barn, till there is none left,
But the rooster. Game over.
The slots to fit the discs in is not easy for the kids to put back in.

Kind of a cute game for the , 2, 3, & 4 yr old, but they get bored fast with it!
This game would have been more fun if it came with little animals then pictues on plastic disc's.
I think what they really like about this is, pushing down on the silo for the disc to move..!!

I will be buying little animals for the children to play make believe with this.
3 stars for the barn, and silo to push on.

title: Excellent fun set of, Call of Duty. 9 yo is not interested!
text:
This is a great set of Call of Duty collector construction set. Ages 12Plus.
Has 378 pieces, some are very tiny and intricate, and othe piece that are large.
If you or your child are into this, your going to really enjoy this set.

That said, I thought my son who was just 9 would be excited with this set! I was wrong. Its not the set ,its him.
My son that has just turned 9yo, has been playing with legos etc. and Call of Duty toys since he has been 3 , 4yo.
He has two big tables in his room that his grandfather build for him for there toys.
Now that he is 9 he is interested in the different sports he plays, school, and music.
Although many kids his age and older would love this Call of Duty set.
I'm going to have to set it aside for him, as he might pick up more interest in this as he gets older.
Or maybe we just started him too young with these types of toys that he did love!

I do recommend this set.

title: Fun school bus for the 2, 3, & 4 yr old. Music & lights, Great price
text:
The Battat school bus is a good size for the kiddos that are 2,3, and 4 yrs.old.
There is music, and lights on the bus.. The ramp goes down to walk the kids off the bus.
On the driver side is a stop sign that goes out to show kids are getting off the buss, and all
Cars have to stop and wait.
Allot of fun make believe .
The colors of the kids inside are bright, and there all clothes , and hats, hair styles are all different .
Very cute.

We have about 5 different Battat trucks etc, the kids love them all.
They take allot of wear from the kids, and do not break, besides the price is very good.

title: Cute Drs. Kit for 3 yr. Old.  Good Price.
text:
The 3 year loves this Dr. Kit.
This comes with 10 plastic play Dr. Fixes for your bumps and boo-boos, and the kit comes with a plastic case.
As a parent that has bought allot of children toys even though this is fun for a 3 yo, I do not think a 5 yr. would like this, its too simple.
We do not hear any heart beat with the Stethoscope. Although for a 3 yo, that is good, as sometimes children will talk threw it, and can
Harm other kids ears.

I really like Battat toys, as there more old school, do not have allot of fancy stuff, and the kiddos play allot of make Believe with them.
Price is always very good, and they hold up well.

title: Cute magnetic feeding doll, with carrier...Its Ok!!
text:
Cute looking baby doll. She comes with 5 different plastic foods that magnets to her hand.
Put the food on her hand, press her tummy , and her hand goes to her mouth like she is eating her food.
Although its still in her hand.
Very mechanical..Same motion all the time
When you feed her, she makes sounds, words that can be understood.

She comes with a plastc baby carrier.
When you sit her in the carrier, the plastic tray is where she can be feed at.
The kids can carry her around by the handle in the carrier, allthough she does not have to be in the carriier.

The doll is hard, but part of the body is soft, the eyes do not move. Her rompers are cute.
The 2 and 3 yo girls think she is fun to play with.

title: Big Barbie Castle. No Barbie dolls, Needs more Accessories.
text:
It's Barbie, and for the 2 and 4 yo, that is pretty much what they care about! Although there so excited with this large Barbie castle.
Went together pretty easy.

Does not come with any Barbie dolls, but they both just got new light up Mermaid Barbies and where so excited to see this comes
With the barbie mermaid pool . ( they do have other barbies).

This barbie castle is a dream come true for children that love Barbies. Most of the goodies for the kids to make believe with
Are plastic. There cute and little.. There is a type of elevator in this that is different, and fun.

I think for this price there could have been more play babie Accessories, but the holidays are coming up.

title: Kids Love these pop beads, loving Battat toys, great price.
text:
These are like the Pop-beads of my time, but allot of really cute and colorful ones.So much fun.
There are 300 hundred pieces in this that are very nice and colorful. Comes in good looking plastic container with a handle.
Makes it easy for the kids to put these away, or carry them to the table to use them.
The packageing is great looking for a gift. Tied around the top is very nice hard cardboard colorful booklet with great ideas on
Different designs so the kids get ideas, or do there own .

All 3 children Love making bead jewelry or different designs with this.These beads are also great for rainy days, when there stuck in the house.
The kids are 2 girls , Two, & Four, and the boy is 3.
It does say its for 4 to 10 yrs. also a warning small parts, not for children under 3...You know your kids, but still make sure
They know not to put these in there mouth.

I'm guessing "Battat" is a fairly new company, but so far I'm impressed with these beads, and now have 3 of there trunks for the kids.
There prices so far are Very reasonable, and there toys are all still holding up very good.

title: Kids love these Battat trunks. Sturdy, great price.
text:
This is the 3rd Battat truck we have for the 3 kiddos..2 yo girl, 3 yo boy, & 4 yo girl.
The kids love these trunks.There simple, with out stuff to lose.
The colors are bright and cheerfull
Comes with one figure . The figures remind me of the old play school ones.
The front loader goes up and down and pulls down to load and up
Has thick softish tires.
Sturdy toys.

I recommend these Battat trucks, and Great price.
Great for a birthday, Xmas gift.

title: 3 kiddos love these, hold up , very sturdy, great price
text:
The 3 kiddos , 2 yo girl, 3 yo boy, & 4 yo girl love these Battat trucks. There sturdy, and well made.heavy plastic.
This fire engine is colorful , comes with two guys / girls. One figure is in the truck, and the other is riding outside on the back side.
The figures come out of the truck.
The ladder goes up and down, and pulls out to go higher.
The tires are a soft plastic, and big.
The front of the cab lifts up.
Has real cute goodies all,around the truck.

We live on a river with sandy beaches, the kids have these in the river, and playing in the sand.
So far so good.

We now have 3 of the Battat trucks
I highly recomend them.
Also for the price they cannot be beat .

title: Strudy trunk, great price, kids 3yo love it
text:
The 3yo loves this sturdy truck.
Its a good size for the kids to play in the sand , dirt and make believe with.
The dump truck back lifts up, and the door there opens to let the dirt come out.
The front lifts up to take the little guy that comes with this in and out, besides its fun to lift the front up, and put other
Toys or figures in.
Nice plasticy type of softish tires.
Colors are good, and the kids like to name the colors.

It says to press the horn and there is a sound, and also the lights go on?
Mine does not do that, or We cant find where its out!!!

There is No instructions that comes with this!?

That said for this price and the fun the kids are having with the truck its a 5 star.
I now ordered 2 different Battat trucks.

title: Kids Love this Barbie boat, comes with everything, but Barbie.
text:
This Barbie boat was larger then I thought it was going to be.
It comes with everything but Barbie or ken dolls.
The girls are 2, 4, and the boy is 3, they All love this Barbie boat toy.
We have Barbie dolls, and also have Barbie Mermaid, which worked out great.

This even has little cup holders on both sides in the front of the boat, with the cups to take out or leave in.
The Pups are a good size with there Raft.
The sun roof can laid back, or cover part of the boat.
The camera, cups etc are small..there is a barbie life jacket.
We live on a river, and I tied a sting around the sides of the sun-roof to keep this from floating away.
It worked great, and the boat can be used in the bathtub.

5 Star, and very good price.

title: Works well and the kids like it.
text:
Our 4 year was speechless when she got this Zoomer Pony. SO Excited.
Both the sisters share this nicely together , as one can comb the mane, tail, while the other is feeding the horse.
Then they give it directions.
It will follow direction and move with you, do some tricks, and the sounds are good
The horse is a good size,and seems to be made well, but the pieces are small.
Do Not lose the pieces to this, as some things will not work.I keep them in a sandwich zip bag.

title: Great fun toy, Lots of parts, let the kids have fun, There kids.
text:
Its a Roll and Roar Animal train. Its true, Allot of parts, and some noise , but this is for kids, and there only kids for a short time.
At least this is not a messy dirty toy.
This has been such a fun toy, it was more then I expected for the almost 2 yr and almost 4yr.
Its a heavy plastic, allot of color, allot of make believe, allot of moving parts for the kiddos to play with.
Songs, and sounds, and words. Its all wrap into one big toy.

I put the kids on the floor with this toy with out other toys around, and try to keep the parts together. I have found
if I put everything in a box after the kids have played with it, then let the kids sort through the box the next day, and start to play again.
Also they help put this toy in the box, and do not want to lose any parts to this..

Fun toy.
Enjoy, 5 star.

title: Cute craft set for girls or boys.
text:
Cute craft set. For a girl, or boy. This is simple .
Comes with a Aquarium box,that is like a regular cardboard box, with a design on the edge that makes this look
Like a shadow box frame. Foam sheets , sticker sheets, glue stick, 5 colorful beads, tissue paper, color string, paper sheets, and
A little insrtuction card with good pictures .

The 3 1/2 yo loves this set, but its only for making one box frame picture, or get another box to make more pictures .
A childern who is 3 needs help making this picture!

title: What a fun toy , the kids are loving this. 5 star.
text:
This sea paw patrol was much bigger then I expected.
From were the ATV is that sits on the back of the boat to the front of the boat is 2 feet long, and 7 1/2 inch wide.

The kiddos watch Paw patrol all the time , and this is a special toy, cause it is a good size, and more then one child can
Can play with this at the same time.
Push the bridge forward and the wheels come down. Push it back the wheels go up , and now its a boat, although
I can not find if this can go in the water , bath tub or not!!
Comes with special batteries.
All the figures are a good size.

The 2 1/2, boy, and 3 1/2 girl are loving this toy. Even the 23 month old is having fun with this Paw Patrol
The kids are playing make believe and since there are allot of figures to play with on here, there all sharing nicely..( whew).

title: Made well, very cute, all 3 kids love these.
text:
My 3 yr old granddaughter will not leave home with out her kidnoculars. She says she is going bird watching , and she is. She is naming birds she sees.
These are sturdy, colorful , are 2X. On the noculars is a notch for the kids nose so its comfortable , and they can figure out the right way to hold this.
We live in the mountains in California , on a river, & pond here.
I took a look through these kidnoculars from my house and was surprised the river looked so close, as the pond did also, Although a bit wavey looking.

I keep on my windowsill Nikon Binoculars to look through all the time. We get cranes , ducks , geese, birds etc. coming through here all the time, and did not want to take the chance any more of the , 2, & 3 yr old using them.
These are perfect for a young child's first binoculars. The kids have used them at the zoo, park, getting closer to the flowers, grass etc, to see all the little bugs on them.

My only complaint is the thin narrow type of string-rope that goes around there neck. The first day of wearing this, it broke. We had to tie it back on, And hope it holds. The little hole it fits into is small, and not large enough for something thicker!
But this is still a 5 star...
Just notices, about a month ago I paid, 9.95, now there 12.45 ! I notice at Xmas everything goes up, but it's not Xmas now.Although I'm still buying another pair so the kids do not fight over these.

title: All The kids love it, and the price is great,
text:
This was for my 3 /12 yr old granddaughter, her sister 1 1/2, and my grandson 2 1/2.
All three kids cannot get enough of watching Solar system with this toy, and can't wait till it gets dark.

You can set the light to stay on for about 5 mins. When the kids are at my house they all 3 fall asleep with this on. In a short time.
It soothing .

It's very easy to work, put in batteries, put in disc, turn this on , and your ready to go.
The front eye piece is what you adjust to make it clear.
For the price, and the enjoyment for the kids this is well worth the money .
It's easy and simple.

The reason for the 4 stars is, Amazon is not yet selling all the discs to this..some education stores sell them, or big toy stores.
Or Amazon will be selling the discs soon.

title: Made well, 1 yr old loves it.
text:
Hung this on a tree limb for my 1 yr old granddaughter.
She is now 16 mo. and still loves to be put in this and swings.

Nice molded plastic.Made good and strong.

title: Fun little Thomas Train set.
text:
I have not seen a child that did not like Thomas Trains.
That said this is a very hands on pretend set. Using what looks like water , tunnels ,
& the helicopter etc.
The one two and three yr old love this toy for different reasons, depending on how
Old they are. Although older children will like this small set, and can use other toys with it .
This set does keep the kids happy, and playing for a long time.

title: Awesome creative building kit.
text:
The K'NEX maker Kit is Big.
My 8 yr old Grandson is at my home allot and when he saw this Kit he does not want to leave!
He knew what it is , and got to work on the dinning room table making a strange looking outer space car ship.

I have to say, I'm over whelmed with all the 863 parts to this kit.
Comes with a great book, and a big plastic sturdy see though box to keep everything in when you
do not have this spread out.
This keeps kids busy for hours, and they love it.
I think its also good for motor skills with there hands / fingers, and thought processing skills on what
they can create on there own or with a friend.

title: Fun toy for the One, Two and Three yr. old
text:
Up-Date, Two of my Grandkids, 2 1/2 & 3 1/2 Cannot stop playing and fighting over this toy. They Love it. And its holding up great.. I'm now giving this a 5 star, instead of the 4 star..
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
First I want to say, I have never gone wrong getting any VTech toy. They last forever, and the kids always have fun with them.
This Smart animal toy has allot going for it, so a few kids can all play together.
Has light up buttons at the top of the elevator, sing along songs that you understand.
Push bottoms that light up,, and the cats meow, which is cute.

This is a Large, and a somewhat heavy toy, that doesn't get knocked over.
My husband put this together, and is not handy.

My Grandkids live a few miles away, so there here allot. There 1, 2 & 3 yrs old, and all of them have fun with this.
With so many things to do with this, it keeps them busy..
Its not just a fun toy for a short time.

I kept the box, to keep all the parts together in it.

title: 5 star, this toy does everything, Kids love it, and will not break.
text:
I was on the fence about getting This VTech Gallop and Rock Pony.
I'm sure glad I got it for my one yr old granddaughter that is at our home all the time, along with her 3 yr old sister.
Just want to say, not only did the one yr love this toy, but the 3 yr did not want to get off this, and share!!

The horse was fairly easy to put together, as most VTech toys are. My hubby is Not handy.
So much going with this pony.
It rocks, it moves, it talks, lights up, songs, phrases etc. Goes from riding to rocking with a flip of the switch basically.

Takes two AA batteries.

I have found that children out grow VTech toys before they get a chance to break.
Honestly, I do not think any of my older grandchildren have every broke a VTech. and we have
allot of there toys, and kids.
